headline: Columbia Global Technology Growth Fund Q2 2025 Commentary
summary: Columbia Threadneedle reports a standout quarter for its Global Tech Growth Fund, fueled by AI-driven gains. Explore how innovation is powering performance.

headline: S&P Global (SPGI) Upgraded to Buy: What Does It Mean for the Stock?
summary: S&P Global (SPGI) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.
